mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE post_title LIKE #{title}
SELECT * FROM post WHERE post_context LIKE #{context}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(board_id, writer, post_title, post_context) VALUES (#{board},#{writer},#{title},#{context})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET board_id=#{board}, post_title=#{title}, post_context=#{context}, post_date=NOW(), post_modify=1 WHERE post_id=#{id}
